title: Stripes, Stripes, Stripes: Knits With Color and Texture
features: Move beyond the basics of one-color knitting! Discover how to knit more than one yarn into a project to create sensational stripes and produce stylish looks without complicated techniques. * Discover how easy it is to use two or more yarns in 15 gorgeous projects, including wearables, accessories, and home-decor accents *Play with stripe widths, bold or subtle colors, bulky or fine yarns the possibilities are limitless * Master this simple technique, and then give your own color-and-texture punch to almost any project you make
description: Sandy Scoville has designed for several major yarn companies and has published numerous titles with Martingale & Company, including several with coauthor Denise Black.
